title: Breakdown Breakthrough
description:
The team talks getting your grit on to make a breakdown a breakthrough. Plus, fitness gifts for Father’s Day and emails on working around injury, improving your fitness performance, and maximizing your cardiovascular strength. 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


This week’s sponsors:

LEGACYBOX.com/JILLIAN to get 40% off your first order

WANDERBEAUTY.com/JILLIAN for 20% off

SAGELYNATURALS.com/JILLIAN for 20% off your first order
